"Battle Training":
"Can you help us out?
The first thing I want to do is conduct a
comparative survey.
If we compare data from the Forest you
have here to the one on Ragol, we might
find a clue about how we can go home.
Please take Kireek and I to the Forest!

※Clear on Normal or higher, accompanied
only by Ash and Kireek"

"Ash's PC ※Given on acceptance
